At this moment, one of our X-cams in the men''s bathroom captures something compelling.
Are you here, little kid? Don''t be afraid.
Ow, Billy, I''m getting that pricking feeling!
I continue trying to communicate with this female, but she never speaks again.
Aaron can go from happy and laughing to Dark Aaron in a second. I call him The Complainer.
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: For the investigation, we need to find women, put masks on them, and and, uhhhh, have us recreate these orgies.
The one thing we don't do is bitch about things.
This house was calling to me for something, in some psychic way.
The guy is connecting with me, wants my energy. He knows that, like, I''m alpha, and he wants to use my power.
At one point, Darren''s wife came back to the house with her pants unbuttoned and belt undone and said that Zozo had attacked her.
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: *... understand...*
I feel something inside my chest. It's cold inside my rib cage.
We act goofy and strange sometimes, which the haters love. 'Oh
column8: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: I felt like I just got stung by a... a spider.
I knew I had done something bad and freaked out a little. I actually ran to the bathroom to look for the knife I had used to stab everyone to make it sure it was still there and not bloody.
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: {author} mentioned the number '3'. They must be mocking the Trinity.
I hear something move in the office. Then an energy shoots towards me.
You have reached your final destination. *Hell.*
Sometimes we have feelings and we can't ignore them.
Suddenly, I am overcome with fear and sadness.
RAW. EXTREME.
Something led me, personally, to this building. It called out, and I answered its call.
I suddenly feel inexplicably exhausted, to the point that I can barely stand up.
As Aaron asks 'Why is he being affected'"
usages: an unexplained light anomaly shoots directly into him."

content: Aaron, use extreme provocation.
A witch doused Aaron in goat's blood during a pagan ritual. He wasn't the same after that ceremony.
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: zÌµÍŒÌ„Ì¦oÌ·Ì½Ì½Í—Í…Í‰Ì»zÌ·Í—Ì®Ì–oÌ¶Í‘Í˜Í”ÍÌ± Ì¶ÍŒÌŠÍ€Ì¢Ì©fÌ·ÌÍ‹ÌšÌ«oÌ´Ì’Í‚ÌÌºuÌ·ÌÌÌ–Ì nÌµÌŒÌ†Í•dÌ¶ÌÌ€ÌŒÌŸ Ì·Ì›ÌÌ™uÌ·Ì”ÌÌ¹Ì£Ì­sÌµÌ¾Ì— Ì´Í‘Ì€ÍŠÌ¼Í‰zÌ¸Ì¿ÌÍ…ÍoÌ¸ÌšÌ²ÌÍzÌ¶Í€ÌŒÍ€Ì¯Ì–Í“oÌµÌ„ÌƒÌ’Ì–Ì¬ Ì¶Ì‚Í”Ì®ÍˆfÌ¸Í˜Í€Ì’Ì±Í‡oÌµÍ‹Í‰ÌÌ—uÌ¸Ì“Ì¬nÌ´Ì‡Ì‘Ì¾ÍšÌ»dÌ¸Ì‘Ì“Ì­ ÌµÍ›Ì£uÌµÌŒÍ‰Ì©ÌsÌ´Ì†Ì—Í”Í‰ Ì¸Ì¿Í’Ì‚Ì¡Ì³zÌ¶ÌÌ Ì­oÌµÍ˜Ì•Í„Ì¦Ì±zÌ¸ÌƒÍŒÍ‹ÌÌ«Ì–oÌ¶Í˜Ì‹ÍÌ¼Ì«Ì Ì·ÌÌ€Í—Í…fÌµÍ‚Ì˜Í”oÌ¸Ì‘Í‘Ì‹ÍšÌ˜uÌ·Ì“ÌnÌ·Ì›Í‘Ì†Ì«ÍœÌ¢dÌ·ÌÌ°Í” ÌµÌ†Ì±ÍÌ«uÌ¶ÍÍÌ”Ì¥Ì¼Ì§sÌ·Ì•ÌÌÍ…Ì– Ì¶Ì¾Í‹Ì¼zÌ¶ÌˆÌ¢oÌ´ÌÌ¤Ì«zÌ´ÌŠÌ“Ì³ÌoÌµÌƒÍˆÍ“ Ì´ÌŠÌ‘Ì¹Ì²fÌ¸Ì”Í„ÌªoÌ´ÍŠÍÍuÌ·ÍÌŠÍ”Í‡Ì¥nÌ¶Ì‹ÍÍ„ÍˆÌ§dÌ´ÍƒÌ€Ì”Ì¯Ì§ÌŸ Ì¸Í†Í–Ì©uÌ¸Ì•Ì‰Í™sÌ·Ì„Ì¤ Ì´Í„Ì‚Ì¿Ì¤Ì¢zÌ¶Í‘Ì»Ì˜oÌ·ÌƒÍ‡ÍÌ©zÌ´Ì¿Ì‘Ì³Ì—oÌ¸Ì‰Ì…ÌœÍ” Ì·ÌˆÍ˜Ì˜Ì¨fÌ´Í›Ì‡Ì™Ì­oÌ·Í‘Ì„Ì¬Ì˜ÍuÌ·ÌÌ›Ì°Í™Ì—nÌ´Í‹Ì‡Ì½Ì°dÌµÍŠÌ®ÍˆÌ± ÌµÌ‹ÍuÌ´Í‚Ì³Ì³Ì¨sÌµÍƒÌÍŠÍ™ Ì´ÌˆÌŒÍÌ¯Ì¯
You wanted us; you got us!
Now, the authorities are turning to us for help.
We are truly in a different dimension, guys.
It is at this time, I feel it is necessary to conduct a field-sobriety test on Billy.
I question God and Jesus, but I don''t question exorcists.
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: We are dealing with a very strong place.
In The Matrix, Keanu Reeves is injected with new programs and he evolves with each new packet of knowledge. It''s the same for me.
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: We swim in the spiritual ocean while everyone else is snorkeling.
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: This place is a ghost town, and a ghost town is this place.
At some point Aaron and I started calling each other G and talking in a slur for no reason.
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: I felt nirvana. I felt ecstasy. I felt an escape from everything. I felt so great. I felt like I wanted to have sex.
Because Aaron is the most affected, I decide to leave him down here alone.
Without warning, I''m overcome with a sense of dread.
Tell Aaron to use provocation, since he''s feeling rage.
The moment Aaron opens the door, a putrid odor fills the hallway.
There are things in this world we will never fully understand... ^(understand)
Ouch! I got a pain on the left side of my head.
Ghost Adventures is a serene island in an ocean of chaos.
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: This is our evidence, our Ghost Adventures.

ğŸ¶ I like to play with toys, I brought my boys ğŸ¶ Aaron likes to play with toys, a lot ğŸ¶ And so we''re gonna come up the stairs ğŸ¶ And we want you to sing with us, ''cause we don''t like to ride the bus ğŸ¶
Just as Aaron discovers this creepy room, a voice tells him to be careful.
I just feel like I shouldn't have asked to go to the sixth dimension.
We have created like an electromagnetic roadway for any of these entities that are listening to me now.
We tried to summon Satan. We tried to call him out. I hate to admit it, but we thought we could pull it off, and I witnessed one of the most disturbing things I''ve ever seen.
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: This makes me angry against the Spanish.
Was this spirit being a smart ass?
It is obvious that these spirits want to quickly get to the saloon to get drunk.
It felt like a superhero turned me to ice, but with energy in it.
Not only did we come back, but we came... with a female!
Will I pass out on the floor and be trapped in another time, while doctors call it 'a stroke'"?"
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: Bro, I just got energy out of nowhere. I''m just like ice-cold. Are you guys cold? Is it cold in here?
I''m a sensitive. I feel emotions, and sometimes, people just don''t understand that.
I feel as though we are diving dangerously deep into the chaotic spiritual dimension on this island.
If trees had eyes, we are definitely being watched.
How many times will Aaron fart on live TV? How will I edit that out?
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: It's not me. I wear deodorant. I do not have B.O.
We will put ourselves on the line to answer anybody's call for help.
I'm sending Aaron in alone to investigate.
Were you in here going potty?
You guys are just a bunch of evil cowards; that's what you guys are.
There was murders, there was mayhem, and all of this has settled down to the bottom like gold in a gold pan, and it''s just waiting down there. That''s where the secrets are kept.
Its 4:17 in the morning, I''m in the basement, and things are about to get weird.
I got rejected by a ghost! I totally feel rejected.
We''re very serious investigators, but we''re also humorous guys. At least we think so.
I just felt a cold wind go over my left ear.
When we create emotions it''s kind of like we''re sweating, and what comes off of our skin is like energy.
Aaron, you go in first.
The one thing we don't do is touch or cut my hair.
This is what it feels like to be in the civil war. That's why we do this.
Hi I''m Zak, what''s your name? Do you want a beer? Do you want a cigarette?
This right here-water- is what killed all the people in Sacramento.
I feel like doing this whole Zoom call thing with Aaron was a bad idea.
I know I've been a little insecure about the dad bod.
What we are documenting in this bathroom is absolutely incredible.

I've had a foot fetish since I was a little kid. It's no secret. I like the cute little toes when they look like soldiers all lined up. Do you know what I mean? I'm not weird. I'm not like a WEIRD foot fetish guy.
Maybe I''m not her type. Aaron, lay down. You look more from that time period.
Sometimes Aaron's face is scarier than anything we see or capture on our cameras.
Aaron's deeply condescending response is proof that we're not in a balanced state of mind.
Are we [bleep] crazy?
This is where all of the... sex would happen.
Now, the female comes through and tells me I''m awesome.
Every time I fly I have to pee. A lot. And I get scared I''ll get sucked out of the airplane lavatory with my wiener hanging out. But I have not, and will never take, a dump in an airplane.
source: I am Haunted: Living Life Through the Dead (Book)

content: Aaron knows he must do what I say. And he does not like it one bit.

It feels like we're walking into a room on another planet.
It''s like we have stepped into a very dark world, and all of us are feeling it.
It is at this moment that I become extremely agitated that Aaron is eating their crackers as we are investigating.
*... answers...*
Aaron, will you take your shirts off so that we can see if it will scratch you on camera?
I own some odd fellows' human skeletons; I own a mummified head.
As the house has been abandoned, it''s very possible that a cat did jump up on the bed and urinate exactly where Aaron''s head is.

I decide to send Aaron in front of me, at which time I see a ball of light shoot right into his back.
Can you please come hold my hand?
Just by stepping foot in this place, you are exposing yourself.
